sentences.en: Why does your anger smolder against the sheep of your pasture?
sentences.cn: 你为何向你草场的羊发怒如烟冒出呢？

sentences.en: She then sings the second stanza by herself, giving the song some real smolder.
sentences.cn: 在第二段中她单独演唱，让这首歌迸发出了火花。

sentences.en: Few here think the unrest will end anytime soon, and the rage of Greece's youth continues to smolder.
sentences.cn: 很少有人认为动荡会在短时间内结束，而希腊年轻一代的怒火仍在持续燃烧。
